record.field: <form string="Module"> <notebook> <page string="Module"> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="shortdesc"/> <field name="shortdesc"/> <separator name="description" colspan="4"/> <field name="description" invisible="0" colspan="4"/> <label name="installed_version"/> <field name="installed_version"/> <label name="latest_version"/> <field name="latest_version"/> <label name="author"/> <field name="author"/> <label name="website"/> <field name="website" widget="url"/> <label name="url"/> <field name="url" widget="url"/> <label name="license"/> <field name="license"/> <label name="demo"/> <field name="demo" readonly="1"/> <newline/> <label name="state"/> <field name="state" readonly="1"/> <group col="6" colspan="2"> <button string="Install" name="button_install" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'uninstalled' '''}"/> <button string="Cancel Install" name="button_install_cancel" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'to install' '''}"/> <button string="Uninstall (beta)" name="button_uninstall" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'installed' '''}"/> <button string="Cancel Uninstall" name="button_uninstall_cancel" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'to remove' '''}"/> <button string="Upgrade" name="button_upgrade" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'installed' '''}"/> <button string="Cancel Upgrade" name="button_upgrade_cancel" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'to upgrade' '''}"/> <!-- <button string="Update translations" name="button_update_translations" type="object" states="{'invisible': '''state != 'installed' '''}"/> --> </group> </page> <page string="Dependencies" col="1"> <field name="dependencies_id"> <tree string="Dependencies"> <field name="name"/> <field name="state"/> </tree> </field> </page> </notebook> </form>

<tree string="Modules" colors="blue:state=='to upgrade' or state=='to install';grey:state=='uninstalled' or state=='uninstallable'"> <field name="name" select="1"/> <field name="shortdesc" select="2"/> <field name="author" select="2"/> <field name="installed_version"/> <field name="latest_version"/> <field name="website" select="2"/> <field name="state" select="1"/> <field name="description" invisible="1" select="2"/> </tree>

<form string="Update Module List"> <label string="This function will check for new modules in the 'modules' path and on module repositories:" colspan="4" align="0.0"/> <field name="repositories" colspan="4"/> </form>
<form string="New modules"> <label name="update"/> <field name="update" colspan="3"/> <label name="add"/> <field name="add" colspan="3"/> </form>

<form string="System Upgrade" col="2"> <image name="gtk-dialog-info"/> <group col="4"> <label align="0.0" string="Your system will be upgraded." colspan="4"/> <label align="0.0" string="Note that this operation my take a few minutes." colspan="4"/> <separator name="module_info"/> <field name="module_info" colspan="4"/> <separator name="module_download"/> <field name="module_download" colspan="4"/> </group> </form>

<form string="System upgrade done" col="1"> <separator string="System upgrade done"/> <label align="0.0" string="The modules have been upgraded / installed !"/> <label align="0.0" string="You may have to reinstall some language pack."/> <label align="0.0" string="We suggest you to reload the menu tab (Ctrl+t Ctrl+r)."/> </form>
